# customWords

**Instance Property**

An array of strings to supplement the recognized languages at the word-recognition stage.

## Declaration

```swift
var customWords: [String]
```

## Discussion

Custom words take precedence over the standard lexicon. The request ignores this value if [doc://Vision/documentation/Vision/RecognizeTextRequest/usesLanguageCorrection] is `false`.

## Inspecting a request

- **automaticallyDetectsLanguage**: A Boolean value that indicates whether to attempt detecting the language to use the appropriate model for recognition and language correction.
- **usesLanguageCorrection**: A Boolean value that indicates whether the request applies language correction during the recognition process.
- **supportedRecognitionLanguages**: The identifiers of the languages that the request supports.
- **minimumTextHeightFraction**: The minimum height, relative to the image height, of the text to recognize.
- **recognitionLanguages**: An array of languages to detect, in priority order.
- **recognitionLevel**: A value that determines whether the request prioritizes accuracy or speed in text recognition.
- **RecognizeTextRequest.RecognitionLevel**: Constants that identify the performance and accuracy of the text recognition.
